title: FPS is all of a sudden really bad
body: So last night i was running the game at my usual 200 fps and i hit a button that made the game go into windowed mode i change it back but ever since then i get 50-70 fps any help?

replies.body: It sounds like a hardware or software issue is causing your frame rate to drop.  As a first step, I would recommend updating your graphics driver.  These steps as well as a few other solutions are also available in our [FPS Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Hopefully this will get you a fix for good, but please let me know if you have any questions!
